example[0]: Tom’s mother was highly critical of the school’s approach.
example[3]: T.S. Eliot’s highly influential poem, ‘The Waste Land’
example[6]: It’s highly unlikely that the project will be finished on time.
definition[0]: to a high level or standard
example[9]: She is a highly educated woman.
definition[1]: if you think highly of someone or something, you think they are very good and you admire them
example[11]: I’ve always thought very highly of Michael.
